title: Scale a ReplicaSet
description: Scale the existing ReplicaSet ||app-rs|| in Namespace ||production|| to ||5|| replicas.

validations.command: kubectl get replicaset app-rs -n production -o jsonpath='{.spec.replicas}'
validations.description: ReplicaSet should be scaled to 5 replicas

validations.command: kubectl get replicaset app-rs -n production -o jsonpath='{.status.readyReplicas}'
